category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WsoFolderSavePref
preference.preference_description: Indicates when to save changes in Workspace. Valid values are 1/2/3. 1 = Save on every change. 2 = Only save when manually prompted. 3 = Prompt the user on close if they want to save.
